Structs/SegmentModel.html#/s:18RESegment.abstract: Bundle that will be used to get image by name

Protocols/SegmentedControlPresettable.ht.abstract: Whether or not should clipsToBounds the segmented control

Protocols/SegmentedControlPresettable.ht.abstract: A segment item tint color (applied to the image)

Protocols/SegmentStylable.html#/s:18RESe.abstract: Whether or not should clipsToBounds the segmented control

Protocols/SegmentItemStylable.html#/s:18.name: tintColor
Protocols/SegmentItemStylable.html#/s:18.abstract: A segment item tint color (applied to the image)

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC18RE.name: applyShadow(with:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC18RE.abstract: Applies shadow to view with specified shadow style

Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.name: preset
Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.abstract: Preset that applied to style Segmented control and it’s child views

Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.name: segmentItems
Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.abstract: Segment items, models that will be used inside segments

Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.name: clearCache()
Classes/RESegmentedControl.html#/s:18RES.abstract: Clears images cache, that was downloaded from a remote server

Classes/ImageDownloader.html.name: ImageDownloader
Classes/ImageDownloader.html.abstract: Image downloader used to get image from remote server and caches image to local cache directory
